statements: SELECT * FROM order_history;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM order_history;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order_history;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM order_history ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_history ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM order_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 200 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(total_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM OrderDetails;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE price > 100;
SELECT promotion_id, product_id, start_date, end_date FROM PromotionHistory ORDER BY promotion_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_spent FROM OrderDetails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT promotion_id, product_id, start_date, end_date FROM PromotionHistory WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_price FROM OrderDetails GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT promo_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM Promotions ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.product_name, OrderDetails.quantity FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.product_id = Products.product_id;
